code: import React from'react';import{withStyles}from'@material-ui/core/styles';import Button from'@material-ui/core/Button';import api from'../api/api';import swal from'sweetalert';var DeclineButtonDesign=withStyles(function(theme){return{root:{borderRadius:44,backgroundColor:'white','&:hover':{transition:'200ms',backgroundColor:'white',border:'2px solid #2B64D2'},border:'1px dotted',marginLeft:-10}};})(Button);var DeclineButton=function DeclineButton(props){var userId={};userId.id=props.id;var handleOnDecline=function handleOnDecline(){api.rejectUnassignedJobs(userId).then(function(res){swal({title:"Declined!",text:"Job request has been successfully Declined!",icon:"success",button:"OK"});props.onAction();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(DeclineButtonDesign,{style:{height:'30px',width:'100px'},onClick:function onClick(){return swal({title:"Are you sure to decline the task?",text:"This action can not be undone!",icon:"warning",buttons:true,dangerMode:true}).then(function(willDelete){if(willDelete){handleOnDecline();}else{swal.close();}});}},"Decline");};export default DeclineButton;
